description: IntroductionFEG Token is a governance token designed to provide holders with passive income by staking their tokens. On February 22nd, 2023, FEG Token and ROX Token will be merged into a new token launched off of the SmartDeFi Technology, offering a fair transaction tax on all projects that launch from their SmartDeFi token launchpad.Staking Rewards ExplainedOnce migrated, 2% of total volume will go directly to staking rewards, and FTW (Peer-2-Peer) transaction and subscription fees will feed marketing, growth, and staking. FEG Token operates on the Ethereum blockchain (ERC-20) and Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20), and will continue to do so after migration.The Future of the FEG Token EcosystemFEG Token plans to expand its trading capabilities to multiple EVM-based blockchains, and release its SmartDeFi Launchpad Technology where anyone can create a cryptocurrency and take it to market within minutes. SD Tokens will be tradeable on any CEX or DEX, and the contract will go through extensive testing and third-party audit to ensure security against flash loans. Functions include staking, asset-backing, smart lending, and liquidity locking.
